title: Io
text: Io is the Ninefold Dragon, the Concordant, the Great Eternal Wheel, Swallower of Shades, and Creator of Dragonkind. It was Io's hand that stirred the blood of [[Siberys]] as it rained onto [[Eberron]] and breathed life into the first [[dragon]]s thus spawned. Io subtly manipulates the destinies of all dragons, always acting for the benefit of dragonkind as a whole.
